typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UniqueID as string,
		{From System} as string,
		{From System ID} as string,
		{To System} as string,
		{To System ID} as string,
		{Link Description} as string,
		{Link ID} as string,
		{Link Type} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(UniqueID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{From System} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
